result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Scott Allen Rauch

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Scott Allen Rauch in court with attorney Thomas W. Kurzynski.  Brandon A Wigley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: LNR  
Pursuant to plea negotiations and on motion of the State, Court ordered case dismissed and read-in to case 15CM2194 for the purposes of sentencing.

Defendant Scott Allen Rauch in court with attorney Thomas W. Kurzynski.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court will VACATE the Jury Trial set for 09-12-2016.  Plea/Sentencing Hearing scheduled for September 12, 2016 at 08:30 am.  COURT WILL RETAIN FILE.

Defendant Scott Allen Rauch in court with attorney Thomas W. Kurzynski.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. Defense counsel requests jury trial date. 

 Defense counsel has received discovery and offer.  Any and all motions are to be filed with the court by the final pretrial date.  Case is adjourned for Final Pretrial Conference and Jury Trial, Branch 45. All parties are notified that effective 8-01-16 this case will be assigned to Judge Kies, Branch 45, in Room 615 of the Courthouse.
  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 26, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for September 12, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Scott Allen Rauch in court with attorney Thomas W. Kurzynski.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 31.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 27, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Scott Allen Rauch in court with attorney Thomas W. Kurzynski.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case calendared for Plea Hearing. For reasons stated on the record court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 31.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for May 2, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Scott Allen Rauch in court with attorney Thomas W. Kurzynski.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case calendered for a Plea Hearing for reasons stated off the record agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 31.  Plea hearing scheduled for April 1, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Scott Allen Rauch in court with attorney Thomas W. Kurzynski.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. For reasons stated on the off the record form,   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 31.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea hearing scheduled for February 29, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Scott Allen Rauch in court with attorney Thomas W. Kurzynski.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for plea and sentencing. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 31.  Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 27, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Scott Allen Rauch in court with attorney Thomas W. Kurzynski.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea. For reasons stated on the off the record form. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 31.  All parties are notified that effective 12-1-15 this case will be assigned to Reserved Branch, Branch 31, in Room 615 of the Courthouse.
Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea hearing scheduled for December 17, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Scott Allen Rauch in court with attorney Thomas W. Kurzynski.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Status conference held off the record.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea hearing scheduled for November 12, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Scott Allen Rauch in court with attorney Thomas W. Kurzynski.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.  Case calendared for pretrial conference.
Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37.  Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Status conference scheduled for October 21, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Scott Allen Rauch in court with attorney Thomas W. Kurzynski.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for pre-trial conference. Defense counsel has a family emergency for today's proceedings. Court ordered case adjourned for pretrial conference in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 14, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

DEFENDANT WAS ORDERED BY THE COURT TO REPORT TO THE MILWAUKEE COUNTY JAIL (CJF) TO BE BOOKED AND RELEASED BY 3:00 P.M. ON  7/25/15. IF THEY FAIL TO APPEAR A BENCH WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED FOR THEIR ARREST.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Scott Allen Rauch in court with attorney Thomas W. Kurzynski.  Lovell Johnson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to Defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 37.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 13, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 7/24/15 @ 1:30 pm
